title: AjA giridhar
sahitya:
AjA giridhar tum AjA apnA banAkE mujhE lEjA


anupallavi

  nA jAnE kaisE rahun tumabina nandakishOr main hUn dinA


caraNam    nAcata mOr Ankh paTayi mOr mukutkA yAd dilAyi nadi kinArE gOpiyAn dEkhI
 nAtha tum hE mErI AnkhEn DhUNDI kOkila tOtA gUnj uThA dE dil bhI virah sE
 lagE taDpatE prEm cuMbana amrta mushkil ab jInA
